00024 void SynchronousASG::initialize(const History& history, const vector<boost::shared_ptr<Robot> >& robots) {
00025 
00026     // extract robots from robot data
00027     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, robots) {
00028         robots_.push_back(robot);
00029     }
00030 }
00031 
00032 boost::shared_ptr<Event> SynchronousASG::get_next_event() {
00033     boost::shared_ptr<Event> event;
00034     if(time_of_next_event_ % kNumberOfEvents == kTimeToLook) {
00035         LookEvent * look_event = new LookEvent(time_of_next_event_);
00036         event.reset(look_event);
00037 
00038         // add all robots. This uses the raw pointer because it is of the right type.
00039         // (it is protected by a shared_ptr and I'm saving a cast)
00040         BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, robots_) {
00041             look_event->add_to_robot_subset(robot);
00042         }
00043 
00044 
00045     } else if(time_of_next_event_ % kNumberOfEvents == kTimeToCompute) {
00046         ComputeEvent * compute_event = new ComputeEvent(time_of_next_event_);
00047         event.reset(compute_event);
00048 
00049         // add all robots. This uses the raw pointer because it is of the right type.
00050         // (it is protected by a shared_ptr and I'm saving a cast)
00051         BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, robots_) {
00052             compute_event->add_to_robot_subset(robot);
00053         }
00054 
00055     } else if(time_of_next_event_ % kNumberOfEvents == kTimeToMove) {
00056         HandleRequestsEvent * handle_requests_event = new HandleRequestsEvent(time_of_next_event_);
00057         event.reset(handle_requests_event);
00058         // copy over all requests
00059         BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<const Request> cur_request, unhandled_request_set_) {
00060             handle_requests_event->add_to_requests(cur_request);
00061         }
00062         unhandled_request_set_.clear();
00063     }
00064     time_of_next_event_++;
00065     return event;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SynchronousASG::update(const WorldInformation& world_information,
00069                             boost::shared_ptr<Event> last_event) {
00070     // check if it is a compute event
00071     ComputeEvent* compute_event = dynamic_cast<ComputeEvent*> (last_event.get());
00072     if(compute_event != NULL) {
00073         BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<const Request> cur_request, compute_event->requests()) {
00074             unhandled_request_set_.push_back(cur_request);
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 #endif /* SYNCHRONOUS_ASG_CC_ */
